summary: Lufthansa, Germany's national airline, is one of the biggest in Europe. It was founded in 1953, replacing the old Deutsche Luft Hansa which was linked to the Nazi regime. Lufthansa is part of a large group that includes other airlines like Austrian Airlines and Swiss International Air Lines. It's also a founding member of Star Alliance, the world's largest airline group. With its main base at Frankfurt Airport, Lufthansa carries millions of passengers every year.
title: Lufthansa
